item.title: Ledger Network integrates Ergo Network
item.description: We’re happy to announce our collaboration with Tesseract Systems through our grants program that is going to provide full integration with the Ledger hardware wallet. This integration will allow Ergonauts to safely store their ERG tokens with the world’s most secure hardware wallet. While there are many other ways users can store and interact with their ERG and tokens, the ledger provides a fully secure way to do this, ensuring that the private keys are never exposed to the internet directly when making a transaction.

item.title: WrapAssets announces integration with ErgoDEX!
item.description: ErgoDEX team recently published Plutus Port proposal on Cardano’s Project Catalyst platform. It offers a cross-chain exchange built on top of Ergo Blockchain for Cardano Ecosystem. WrapAssets is a service provider for wrapped assets (like waBTC, waETH, waDOT) on top of Cardano Ecosystem. This integration will help ErgoDEX to achieve high liquidity and ADA holders can benefit from a secure cross-chain DEX with a variety of ready-to-use assets. WrapAssets.io As Cardano marching towards the Goguen Era, cross-chain integrations will be available across Cardano Ecosystem.
